sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import moment from 'moment'; import{ Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProjectItem = ({ id, name, start_date, end_date, assigned_to, type, project_stage, payment_received, payment_date, onDelete }) => { return ( {id} {name} {/* {number} */} {moment(start_date).format('DD/MM/YYYY')} {moment(end_date).format('DD/MM/YYYY')} {assigned_to} {type} {project_stage} {payment_received} {moment(payment_date).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}   ); } export default ProjectItem;
